Name: NeedlePlant
Notes: A spiky plant that damages the player when touched. It can be destroyed with fireballs, Yoshi's projectiles, the Rock power-up and the Rainbow power-up, Coconuts and Stretch Plants.

Obj_arg0.Name: Item Type
Obj_arg0.Description: The item to be spawned after spinning near it.

Obj_arg1.Name: Validate Shadow?
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, its shadow will be enabled.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_DEAD.Description: Gets activated when it dies. Due to an oversight, this does not work for NeedlePlant in SMG2.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted and frozen by player 2.

YoshiTargetable.Description: Can be targeted and pulled by Yoshi.
